metadata.Title: CVE-2012-4668 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Roundcube Webmail 0.8.1 andearlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML viathe signature in an email.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-4668` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

roundcube - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-core - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-mysql - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-pgsql - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-plugins - 0.9.5-4
roundcube-sqlite3 - 0.9.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: roundcube package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.5-4').
